title.narrative: 13.5 COMMUNICATION, ADVOCACY

description.narrative: 13.5 Evidence Based and strategic communication events and support child praticipation activities fundraising and advocacy, which contributes to Cross-Sectoral Communication For Development, Social Protection. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Programme Component Results (PCR) 13 Cross Sectoral Management Support

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents
